Category: Home & Education, Business
Language: Multilingual included. Spanish
Included Medicine.
Format: ISO
System: WinXP / Vista / Seven

Description

Prime Mathcad 1.0 is the latest version of PTC's standard software for engineering calculations. Mathcad Prime 1.0 has been completely redesigned on a new platform to provide an updated interface that improves usability and is even easier to learn. It also offers efficient performance with current computing environment and focused on the document so that users can quickly and easily create documents for engineering design and professional complexes.
New features and benefits include

    * Improved usability and
      discovery experienced users can perform more
      tasks with less effort and time users spend less time
      learning how to use Mathcad Prime 1.0
    * Environment-centered computing
      in the document: reducing the time it takes to develop a road
      design work by combining math,
      text and images in one document. That means less time
      dedicated to edit and format the worksheet.
    * Exploring Mathematics
      Advanced: Create test calculations quickly and easily, before
      being committed to a design to reduce rework in the process
      design.
    * Function Library
      Numerical: numerical functions with ready to use, may address
      any computational problem and save time and labor.
    * Dynamic Verification
      units, has full support units in all calculations
      Prime created in Mathcad 1.0, resulting in fewer errors and greater
      accuracy, while improving the efficiency of processes in the
      product development.
    * Backwards compatibility:
      quickly become the most engineering worksheets
      stored in the format previous versions of Mathcad 7.0, with a
      summary of the specific problems of compatibility and minimizing
      work recreate calculations and worksheets.
    * Equation
      WYSIWYG: Express constraints and solutions of problems in notation
      natural mathematics, focusing on calculations and devoting less time
      to manipulate the document.
    * Design of Experiments (DoE): save time, labor and building costs less experienced but more intelligent.
    * Maximize productivity with full support for Windows 7.
